cause.description:
Global HEED works with local NGOs in western Nepal to empower and engage civic society in development programs
See www.globalheed.org for more
1. Our world is a global village: we all have the power to improve the lives of our neighbors both near and far
2. Our American staff are volunteers, and take no payment for their service
3. Capacity building and local involvement are the path to sustainable development
cause.mission: Provide free medical care in extremely remote and underpriviledged regions of Nepal.
cause.name: Medicine in Nepal
